com.ephesoft.dcma.da.dao

Interface SecurityUserDao

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Dao<SecurityUser>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SecurityUserDaoImpl

    public interface SecurityUserDao
extends Dao<SecurityUser>
    Provides data accessibility for security user entity like getting user roles, all user roles, logged in user is super admin or not etc.
    Version:
    1.0 $LastChangedDate:$
    $LastChangedRevision:$
    Author:
    Ephesoft created on 18-Nov-2013

      Finds the user with the given user-name.

      Gets all the users in the Ephesoft application.
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getUserRoles(java.lang.String userName)
      Gets the set of roles assigned to the passed user name.
      boolean isSuperAdmin(java.lang.String userName)
      Checks if the passed user belongs to super-admin role or not.

        count, countAll, create, evict, get, getAll, merge, remove, removeAll, saveOrUpdate

    • Method Detail

      • getUserRoles

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getUserRoles(java.lang.String userName)
        Gets the set of roles assigned to the passed user name.
        Parameters:
        userName - String user name of logged in user.
        Returns:
        Set<String> NULL if the user name passed is NULl or empty otherwise roles assigned to user.

      • getAllUser

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAllUser()
        Gets all the users in the Ephesoft application.
        Returns:
        Set<String> set of all the users.

      • isSuperAdmin

        boolean isSuperAdmin(java.lang.String userName)
        Checks if the passed user belongs to super-admin role or not.
        Parameters:
        userName - String user-name of logged in user.
        Returns:
        boolean true/false true if user belongs to super admin role otherwise false.

      • findSecurityUserByName

        SecurityUser findSecurityUserByName(java.lang.String userName)
        Finds the user with the given user-name.
        Parameters:
        userName - String user-name of logged in user.
        Returns:
        SecurityUser if the user exists with the given name otherwise NULL.
